name: Cartoon Mango
tagline: A UI/UX design and development firm
description:
Cartoon Mango is a multidisciplinary design and development studio specialising in UI, visual communication, branding, motion design, web and mobile app development and virtual reality. Since our inception in 2014, we have provided carefully crafted experiences for the end-user and have helped brands grow by being closely involved in each phase of a project.
As a young organization, we strive to exceed client expectations to achieve high standards of excellence through strategic planning and execution.
